title: modified
extract: Modified is the past tense of modify, from the Latin modificare, meaning “to limit,” or “restrain.” Modified anything has been altered. A modified schedule has been reshuffled, a modified diet limits your regular calorie intake, and a modified workout lets you sit on your couch and watch Jack LaLanne sweat.
extract_html: Modified is the past tense of modify, from the Latin modificare, meaning “to limit,” or “restrain.” Modified anything has been altered. A modified schedule has been reshuffled, a modified diet limits your regular calorie intake, and a modified workout lets you sit on your couch and watch Jack LaLanne sweat.
